alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Interior Waldo; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 17 at 7:42PM EST until December 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal Waldo, Interior Waldo, Knox, Lincoln, Sagadahoc, Coastal Cumberland, and Coastal York Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered to numerous power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Damaging winds will blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Interior Waldo; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc
